info.title: SqlVirtualMachineManagementClient
info.description: The SQL virtual machine management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure Compute, Network & Storage services to manage your SQL Server virtual machine. The API enables users to create, delete and retrieve a SQL virtual machine, SQL virtual machine group or availability group listener.

get.description: Lists all of the available SQL Virtual Machine Rest API operations.
Gets all SQL virtual machine groups in a subscription.
Gets all SQL virtual machines in a subscription.
Gets all SQL virtual machine groups in a resource group.
Gets a SQL virtual machine group.

AADAuthenticationSettings.description: Enable AAD authentication for SQL VM.

clientId.description: The client Id of the Managed Identity to query Microsoft Graph API. An empty string must be used for the system assigned Managed Identity

isRServicesEnabled.description: Enable or disable R services (SQL 2016 onwards).

AdditionalOsPatch.description: Additional VM Patching solution enabled on the Virtual Machine

commit.description: Replica commit mode in availability group.

failover.description: Replica failover mode in availability group.

readableSecondary.description: Replica readable secondary mode in availability group.

AssessmentDayOfWeek.description: Day of the week to run assessment.

AssessmentSettings.description: Configure SQL best practices Assessment for databases in your SQL virtual machine.

enable.description: Enable or disable SQL best practices Assessment feature on SQL virtual machine.

runImmediately.description: Run SQL best practices Assessment immediately on SQL virtual machine.

schedule.description: Schedule for SQL best practices Assessment.

AutoBackupSettings.description: Configure backups for databases in your SQL virtual machine.

enable.description: Enable or disable autobackup on SQL virtual machine.

enableEncryption.description: Enable or disable encryption for backup on SQL virtual machine.

storageAccountUrl.description: Storage account url where backup will be taken to.

storageContainerName.description: Storage container name where backup will be taken to.

storageAccessKey.description: Storage account key where backup will be taken to.

backupSystemDbs.description: Include or exclude system databases from auto backup.

fullBackupFrequency.description: Frequency of full backups. In both cases, full backups begin during the next scheduled time window.

daysOfWeek.description: Days of the week for the backups when FullBackupFrequency is set to Weekly.

fullBackupStartTime.description: Start time of a given day during which full backups can take place. 0-23 hours.

fullBackupWindowHours.description: Duration of the time window of a given day during which full backups can take place. 1-23 hours.

AutoPatchingSettings.description: Set a patching window during which Windows and SQL patches will be applied.

enable.description: Enable or disable autopatching on SQL virtual machine.

dayOfWeek.description: Day of week to apply the patch on.

maintenanceWindowStartingHour.description: Hour of the day when patching is initiated. Local VM time.

additionalVmPatch.description: Additional Patch to be enable or enabled on the SQL Virtual Machine.

AvailabilityGroupListener.description: A SQL Server availability group listener.

value.description: The AvailabilityGroupListener items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AvailabilityGroupListenerProperties.description: The properties of an availability group listener.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state to track the async operation status.

loadBalancerConfigurations.description: List of load balancer configurations for an availability group listener.

multiSubnetIpConfigurations.description: List of multi subnet IP configurations for an AG listener.

createDefaultAvailabilityGroupIfNotExist.description: Create a default availability group if it does not exist.

ClusterManagerType.description: Type of cluster manager: Windows Server Failover Cluster (WSFC), implied by the scale type of the group and the OS type.

Commit.description: Replica commit mode in availability group.

DayOfWeek.description: Day of week to apply the patch on.

DiskConfigAssessmentRequest.description: Configure disk config assessment for databases in your SQL virtual machine.

runDiskConfigRules.description: Boolean to run disk config Assessment. Use false to fetch past Assessment.

DiskConfigurationType.description: Disk configuration to apply to SQL Server.

Failover.description: Replica failover mode in availability group.

FullBackupFrequencyType.description: Frequency of full backups. In both cases, full backups begin during the next scheduled time window.

IdentityType.description: The identity type. Set this to 'SystemAssigned' in order to automatically create and assign an Azure Active Directory principal for the resource.

KeyVaultCredentialSettings.description: Configure your SQL virtual machine to be able to connect to the Azure Key Vault service.

enable.description: Enable or disable key vault credential setting.

servicePrincipalName.description: Service principal name to access key vault.

servicePrincipalSecret.description: Service principal name secret to access key vault.

LoadBalancerConfiguration.description: A load balancer configuration for an availability group listener.

publicIpAddressResourceId.description: Resource id of the public IP.

loadBalancerResourceId.description: Resource id of the load balancer.

sqlVirtualMachineInstances.description: List of the SQL virtual machine instance resource id's that are enrolled into the availability group listener.

MultiSubnetIpConfiguration.description: Multi subnet ip configuration for an availability group listener.

sqlVirtualMachineInstance.description: SQL virtual machine instance resource id that are enrolled into the availability group listener.

Operation.description: Result of the request to list SQL operations.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object."

display.description: he localized display information for this particular operation / action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation."

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

OperationListResult.description: Virtual machine resource id for response.

value.description: The Operation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

OperationOrigin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

PrivateIPAddress.description: A private IP address bound to the availability group listener.

ipAddress.description: Private IP address bound to the availability group listener.

subnetResourceId.description: Subnet used to include private IP.

ReadableSecondary.description: Replica readable secondary mode in availability group.

principalId.description: The Azure Active Directory principal id.

type.description: The identity type. Set this to 'SystemAssigned' in order to automatically create and assign an Azure Active Directory principal for the resource.

tenantId.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant id.

SQLInstanceSettings.description: Set the server/instance-level settings for SQL Server.

isOptimizeForAdHocWorkloadsEnabled.description: SQL Server Optimize for Adhoc workloads.

SQLStorageSettings.description: Set disk storage settings for SQL Server.

luns.description: Logical Unit Numbers for the disks.

useStoragePool.description: Use storage pool to build a drive if true or not provided

dataFileSize.description: SQL Server tempdb data file size

dataGrowth.description: SQL Server tempdb data file autoGrowth size

logFileSize.description: SQL Server tempdb log file size

logGrowth.description: SQL Server tempdb log file autoGrowth size

dataFileCount.description: SQL Server tempdb data file count

persistFolder.description: SQL Server tempdb persist folder choice

persistFolderPath.description: SQL Server tempdb persist folder location

luns.description: Logical Unit Numbers for the disks.

useStoragePool.description: Use storage pool to build a drive if true or not provided

Schedule.description: Set assessment schedule for SQL Server.

enable.description: Enable or disable assessment schedule on SQL virtual machine.

weeklyInterval.description: Number of weeks to schedule between 2 assessment runs. Takes value from 1-6

monthlyOccurrence.description: Occurrence of the DayOfWeek day within a month to schedule assessment. Takes values: 1,2,3,4 and -1. Use -1 for last DayOfWeek day of the month

dayOfWeek.description: Day of the week to run assessment.

startTime.description: Time of the day in HH:mm format. Eg. 17:30

ServerConfigurationsManagementSettings.description: Set the connectivity, storage and workload settings.

sqlAuthUpdateUserName.description: SQL Server sysadmin login to create.

SqlStorageUpdateSettings.description: Set disk storage settings for SQL Server.

startingDeviceId.description: Device id of the first disk to be updated.

diskConfigurationType.description: Disk configuration to apply to SQL Server.

identity.description: DO NOT USE. This value will be deprecated. Azure Active Directory identity of the server.

sqlImageOffer.description: SQL image offer. Examples may include SQL2016-WS2016, SQL2017-WS2016.

SqlVirtualMachineGroupUpdate.description: An update to a SQL virtual machine group.

virtualMachineResourceId.description: ARM Resource id of underlying virtual machine created from SQL marketplace image.

sqlImageOffer.description: SQL image offer. Examples include SQL2016-WS2016, SQL2017-WS2016.

leastPrivilegeMode.description: SQL IaaS Agent least privilege mode.

sqlVirtualMachineGroupResourceId.description: ARM resource id of the SQL virtual machine group this SQL virtual machine is or will be part of.

wsfcDomainCredentials.description: Domain credentials for setting up Windows Server Failover Cluster for SQL availability group.

wsfcStaticIp.description: Domain credentials for setting up Windows Server Failover Cluster for SQL availability group.

autoPatchingSettings.description: Auto patching settings for applying critical security updates to SQL virtual machine.

autoBackupSettings.description: Auto backup settings for SQL Server.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Enable automatic upgrade of Sql IaaS extension Agent.

additionalVmPatch.description: Additional VM Patching solution enabled on the Virtual Machine

virtualMachineIdentitySettings.description: Virtual Machine Identity details used for Sql IaaS extension configurations.

osType.description: Operating System of the current SQL Virtual Machine.

SqlVirtualMachineUpdate.description: An update to a SQL virtual machine.

SqlVmTroubleshooting.description: Details required for SQL VM troubleshooting

virtualMachineResourceId.description: Virtual machine resource id for response.

SqlWorkloadTypeUpdateSettings.description: Set workload type to optimize storage for SQL Server.

StorageConfigurationSettings.description: Storage Configurations for SQL Data, Log and TempDb.

sqlSystemDbOnDataDisk.description: SQL Server SystemDb Storage on DataPool if true.

diskConfigurationType.description: Disk configuration to apply to SQL Server.

enableStorageConfigBlade.description: Enable SQL IaaS Agent storage configuration blade in Azure Portal.

TroubleshootingStatus.description: Status of last troubleshooting operation on this SQL VM

lastTriggerTimeUtc.description: Last troubleshooting trigger time in UTC timezone

UnhealthyReplicaInfo.description: SQL VM Troubleshoot UnhealthyReplica scenario information.

availabilityGroupName.description: The name of the availability group

VirtualMachineIdentity.description: Virtual Machine Identity details used for Sql IaaS extension configurations.

type.description: Identity type of the virtual machine. Specify None to opt-out of Managed Identities.

resourceId.description: ARM Resource Id of the identity. Only required when UserAssigned identity is selected.

VmIdentityType.description: Identity type of the virtual machine. Specify None to opt-out of Managed Identities.

WsfcDomainCredentials.description: Domain credentials for setting up Windows Server Failover Cluster for SQL availability group.

WsfcDomainProfile.description: Active Directory account details to operate Windows Server Failover Cluster.

domainFqdn.description: Fully qualified name of the domain.

ouPath.description: Organizational Unit path in which the nodes and cluster will be present.

clusterBootstrapAccount.description: Account name used for creating cluster (at minimum needs permissions to 'Create Computer Objects' in domain).

clusterOperatorAccount.description: Account name used for operating cluster i.e. will be part of administrators group on all the participating virtual machines in the cluster.

sqlServiceAccount.description: Account name under which SQL service will run on all participating SQL virtual machines in the cluster.

isSqlServiceAccountGmsa.description: The flag to check if SQL service account is GMSA.

storageAccountUrl.description: Fully qualified ARM resource id of the witness storage account.

storageAccountPrimaryKey.description: Primary key of the witness storage account.
